Name: Throttle network speed
Description: Can I throttle network speed to simulate slower network connections like 2G, 3G etc.,?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. In **Network** > Click the dropdown "No Throttling" and select a value to throttle the network speed.
Chrome.Name: Throttle network speed

Firefox.Notes: 1. In Network > Click the dropdown "No Throttling" and select a value to throttle the network speed.
Firefox.Name: Throttle network speed

Edge.Notes: 1. In Network > Click the dropdown "No Throttling" and select a value to throttle the network speed.
Edge.Name: Throttle network speed

Opera.Notes: 1. In Network > Click the dropdown "No Throttling" and select a value to throttle the network speed.
Opera.Name: Throttle network speed
